title: Naked eye detection of arsenite, arsenate, and H2S by a Schiff base naphthaldehyde conjugate using a single paper strip, based on a deprotonation mechanism
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00213J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Diptiman De, Priyotosh Ghosh, Sriman De, Prithidipa Sahoo
A ‘three-in-one’ paper strip-based colorimetric chemosensor for rapid, cost-effective, and selective sensing of arsenite, arsenate, and sulfide for on-site and real-time monitoring in environmental samples.
